page.title: 07An Eckington Mum.
page.content: Woke 7.15, I washed, dressed then made breakfast and lunch-boxes.Nils left for work. Children dressed while I did chores then they played the organ. 8.30 Nick went to school, Jessica came, I fed the rabbit, then took the girls to Alex's to play. I went and supervised playgroup. A student came this week. It rained outside so we played with water indoors. Water went everywhere. Then I collected the girls and went home. 12.45 The girls had cakes for lunch ( which they made at Alex's).William arrived. After washing up, sorting the laundry and completing the PPA questionaire, I spent the afternoon telling stories. 3.15 We walked up to the school past the water authority's 'Hole-in-the-road'. At school I collected eggs. On the way back from school we went to the PO to buy sweets
